Articles.Content:
Anyone interesting in a 4 ton, 100 KW mini fission reactor with a 10 year fuel supply?

Let me know and I'll get it up on spaceport.

MediaFire Link

Edited January 1, 2014 by SasquatchM

hmm looks like a great project but you may want to look into some work by Nertea and someone named hoojiwana for they may offer some help

Edit: oh wait is this already done or are you developing because if developing look above if releasing then ok release because i always loved your stuff Sasquatch Marmalade

Edited December 31, 2013 by Helix935
I would love to have it. It would go nicely on my newest Interstellar Space Station I'm making. What diameter is it and do you mind if i were to edit my own sizes for personal use?

I have a few things a have made for personal use that I am considering releasing. This came about because I made a Induction Sail to play around with and arbitrarily decided it used a bunch of power. It is actuall considerably underpowered for it's size if you determine 1 electricCharge to be = 1 watt.

It is currently 2 meters, but edit away on it.

Here is a MediaFire Link.

Download is fixed now!

Edited January 1, 2014 by SasquatchM
Awesome! SasquatchM is baaacckkk! Any plans of updating rest of your stuff to .23? *coughFissionFragmentEnginecough*
I love you, can't wait till i get off work to play with that baby. Much appreciated!
It is really just some cfg edits, I can probably swing that in the next couple days
Did you miss a file or plugin or something in the upload? Can't get it to work in Sandbox or Career Modes.

looks more like it could contain a polywell rather than a fission reactor, but thats not a bad thing. kinda reminicent of this:

Edited January 1, 2014 by Nuke
I originally put it under Utility and moved it to Electrical after the fact. Try moving the folder infor Utility and see if that helps. I am going to run a clean install and check here as well.

Nevermind, I just noticed the .cfg is missing from that download for some reason.

NEW LINK HERE

I also corrected a decimal error that was resulting in a 1 year lifespan instead of 10

All links are updated to the current version.

Edited January 1, 2014 by SasquatchM

Good it works perfectly now, I was wondering if my brain was playing tricks on me from sleep deprivation >_>. Good to know its not.

Once again, thank you for the awesome part. I love how this games modding community makes such good quality stuff with great textures, I've been like a fat kid stuck in a candy shop running through all the threads finding all these nice parts to make my Interstellar Space Station with the last few weeks lol. Now i just need to throw together the cargo bay i need and I can begin construction!

Hi folks!

I know this thread hasn't been active for a while, is the reactor still worked on?

If so, awesome! I love the style and numbers of this baby!

I have a small request though: I would love to have this for long duration satellite missions, so is it possible to have it in a 0.625m (or even 0.5m) form factor? I tried to tweakscale the original but now the input/output-ratio is totally off. Would also be great to have a small UraniumNitride storage unit!

Thanks a bunch and best regards

Edited September 15, 2014 by E.Nygma

Does anyone know what the licenses is on this mod , I don't see it ?

EDIT- @E.Nygma I sent you a PM you might want to cut the OUTPUT on the small 1, I didn't think about it at the time.

EDIT= No Problem E.Nygma if you can't get it let me know will change what ever.

Edited September 15, 2014 by Mecripp2

@MeCripp Thanks a bunch, will try it when I'm not on my mobile anymore had the same idea about a tank just using the radial one

EDIT = Thanks again, works like a charm (tweaked OUTPUT to 10000, INPUT to 0.0000025) have my rep

Edited September 15, 2014 by E.Nygma
